verses.verse: "Sing, <S%H7442><s%> barren, <S%H6135><s%> you who didn't <S%H3205><s%> bear; break forth <S%H6476><s%> into singing, <S%H7440><s%> and cry aloud, <S%H6670><s%> you who did not travail with child: <S%H2342><s%> for more <S%H7227><s%> are the children <S%H1121><s%> of the desolate <S%H8074><s%> than the children <S%H1121><s%> of the married wife, <S%H1166><s%>" says <S%H559><s%> Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%>

"Enlarge <S%H7337><s%> the place <S%H4725><s%> of your tent, <S%H168><s%> and let them stretch forth <S%H5186><s%> the curtains <S%H3407><s%> of your habitations; <S%H4908><s%> don't <S%H2820><s%> spare: lengthen <S%H748><s%> your cords, <S%H4340><s%> and strengthen <S%H2388><s%> your stakes. <S%H3489><s%>

For you shall spread out <S%H6555><s%> on the right hand <S%H3225><s%> and on the left; <S%H8040><s%> and your seed <S%H2233><s%> shall possess <S%H3423><s%> the nations, <S%H1471><s%> and make the desolate <S%H8074><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%> to be inhabited. <S%H3427><s%>

"Don't <S%H3372><s%> be afraid; for you shall not be ashamed: <S%H954><s%> neither be confounded; <S%H3637><s%> for you shall not be disappointed: <S%H2659><s%> for you shall forget <S%H7911><s%> the shame <S%H2659><s%> of your youth; <S%H5934><s%> and the reproach <S%H2781><s%> of your widowhood <S%H491><s%> you shall remember no more. <S%H2142><s%>

For your Maker <S%H6213><s%> is your husband; <S%H1166><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> of Armies <S%H6635><s%> is his name: <S%H8034><s%> and the Holy One <S%H6918><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> is your Redeemer; <S%H1350><s%> the God <S%H430><s%> of the whole earth <S%H776><s%> shall he be called. <S%H7121><s%>

For Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> has called <S%H7121><s%> you as a wife <S%H802><s%> forsaken <S%H5800><s%> and grieved <S%H6087><s%> in spirit, <S%H7307><s%> even a wife <S%H802><s%> of youth, <S%H5271><s%> when she is cast off, <S%H3988><s%>" says <S%H559><s%> your God. <S%H430><s%>
"For a small <S%H6996><s%> moment <S%H7281><s%> have I forsaken <S%H5800><s%> you; <S%H1419><s%> but with great mercies <S%H7356><s%> will I gather you. <S%H6908><s%>

In overflowing <S%H8241><s%> wrath <S%H7110><s%> I hid <S%H5641><s%> my face <S%H6440><s%> from you for a moment; <S%H7281><s%> but with everlasting <S%H5769><s%> loving kindness <S%H2617><s%> will I have mercy <S%H7355><s%> on you, <S%H559><s%>" says Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your Redeemer. <S%H1350><s%>

"For this is like the waters <S%H4325><s%> of Noah <S%H5146><s%> to me; <S%H7650><s%> for as I have sworn that the waters <S%H4325><s%> of Noah <S%H5146><s%> shall no more go over <S%H5674><s%> the earth, <S%H776><s%> so have I sworn <S%H7650><s%> that I will not be angry <S%H7107><s%> with you, <S%H1605><s%> nor rebuke you.

For the mountains <S%H2022><s%> may depart, <S%H4185><s%> and the hills <S%H1389><s%> be removed; <S%H4131><s%> but my loving kindness <S%H2617><s%> shall not depart <S%H4185><s%> from you, <S%H1285><s%> neither shall my covenant of peace <S%H7965><s%> be removed, <S%H4131><s%>" says <S%H559><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> who has mercy on you. <S%H7355><s%>

"You afflicted, <S%H6041><s%> tossed with storms, <S%H5162><s%> and not comforted, behold, <S%H7257><s%> I will set your stones <S%H68><s%> in beautiful colors, <S%H6320><s%> and lay <S%H7257><s%> your foundations <S%H3245><s%> with sapphires. <S%H5601><s%>

I will make <S%H7760><s%> your pinnacles <S%H8121><s%> of rubies, <S%H3539><s%> and your gates <S%H8179><s%> of sparkling jewels, <S%H68><s%> and all your walls <S%H1366><s%> of precious <S%H2656><s%> stones. <S%H68><s%>
All your children <S%H1121><s%> shall be taught <S%H3928><s%> of Yahweh; <S%H3068><s%> and great <S%H7227><s%> shall be the peace <S%H7965><s%> of your children. <S%H1121><s%>

In righteousness <S%H6666><s%> you shall be established: <S%H3559><s%> you shall be far <S%H7368><s%> from oppression, <S%H6233><s%> for you shall not be afraid; <S%H3372><s%> and from terror, <S%H4288><s%> for it shall not come near you. <S%H7126><s%>

Behold, <S%H1481><s%> they may gather together, <S%H1481><s%> but not <S%H657><s%> by me: <S%H4310><s%> whoever shall gather together <S%H1481><s%> against you shall fall because of you. <S%H5307><s%>

"Behold, <S%H1254><s%> I have created the smith <S%H2796><s%> who blows <S%H5301><s%> the fire <S%H784><s%> of coals, <S%H6352><s%> and brings forth <S%H3318><s%> a weapon <S%H3627><s%> for his work; <S%H4639><s%> and I have created <S%H1254><s%> the waster <S%H7843><s%> to destroy. <S%H2254><s%>

No weapon <S%H3627><s%> that is formed <S%H3335><s%> against you will prevail; <S%H6743><s%> and you will condemn <S%H7561><s%> every tongue <S%H3956><s%> that rises <S%H6965><s%> against you in judgment. <S%H4941><s%> This is the heritage <S%H5159><s%> of the servants <S%H5650><s%> of Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> and their righteousness <S%H6666><s%> which is of me, <S%H5002><s%>" says Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%>
